title: Betrayed by a handprint
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: Society lady turned thief gets caught out when she leaves her hand print at the scene of the crime. Cast includes Florence Lawrence, Harry Solter, Linda arvidson, Kate Bruce, Gene Gauntier, George Gebhardt, Mack Sennett. Silent film with English intertitles.
